title: Aadhya Ruby & Polki Stud Earrings - A Modern Take on Traditional Elegance
features: These earrings showcase a stunning oval-cut Ruby embraced by a contemporary square frame, adding a modern touch to the traditional stud design. The piece features a round polki diamond with a halo setting. The intricate detailing showcases impeccable craftsmanship and the famous Hyderabadi polish brings out the richness of the gold. The rectangle shape give it a contemporary feel.
occasions: Perfect for both formal and semi-formal occasions
or to add a touch of elegance to your daily wear. Suited for weddings
description: These earrings represent a harmonious blend of traditional and modern design. The rich red Ruby symbolizes love and passion, while the Polki diamonds add a touch of timeless elegance. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, these earrings are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
